{{also|Grau|grâu|graŭ}} ==Asturian== ===Noun=== {{ast-noun|m|graos}} # [[grade]], [[degree]] # [[degree]] (of temperature, pressure, angle) # [[degree]] (award) # [[year]], [[form]] (of school) ---- ==Catalan== ===Etymology=== From {{der|ca|la|gradus}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{ca-IPA}} * {{rhymes|ca|aw}} ===Noun=== {{ca-noun|m}} # [[degree]] {{rfclarify|ca}} # [[grade]], [[level]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|ca|postgrau}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|ca|gradual}} * {{l|ca|graduar}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:IEC2}} * {{R:GDLC}} * {{R:DNV}} * {{R:DCVB}} [[Category:ca:Education]] ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|grāo}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*grēwaz}}. Compare {{cog|en|gray}}, {{m|en|grey}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{rhymes|de|aʊ}} * {{IPA|de|/ɡʁaʊ̯/}} * {{audio|de|De-grau.ogg|audio}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|er|sten}} # [[grey]], [[gray]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|grau|grauer|graust}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|gries}} {{q|regional, fairly rare}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de|ergrauen |Grau |graue Maus |Graugesicht |Grauzone }} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Colors]] ---- ==German Low German== ===Etymology=== Cognate to {{cog|de|grau}}, {{cog|nl|grauw}}. ===Adjective=== {{head|nds-de|adjective|comparative|grauer|superlative|graust}} # [[grey]] ====Declension==== {{nds-decl-adj|head=grau|grau|grau|Graue|grauer|graust|Graust}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|nds-de|gries}} * {{l|nds-de|graag}} [[Category:nds-de:Colors]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|hrx|goh|grāo}}, from {{inh|hrx|gem-pro|*grēwaz}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/kraʊ̯/}} ===Adjective=== {{head|hrx|adjective|comparative|grauer|superlative|grauest}} # [[grey]], [[gray]] #: {{ux|hrx|Meer hon drei '''graue''' Katze.|We have three '''grey''' cats.}} ===See also=== {{table:colors/hrx}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] [[Category:hrx:Colors]] ---- ==Portuguese== {{wikipedia|lang=pt}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|pt|grao}} {{qualifier|obsolete}} ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|roa-opt|pt}} {{m|roa-opt|grao}}, {{m|roa-opt|graao}}, from {{etyl|la|pt}} {{m|la|gradus}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|pt}} {{m|ine-pro|*gʰredʰ-}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|pt|/ˈɡɾaw/}} ===Noun=== {{pt-noun|m}} # [[degree]] (of temperature) #: {{ux|pt|A água congela a zero '''grau''' centígrado.|Water freezes at 0 degrees Celsius.}} # [[academic]] degree # [[degree]] (of angle measure) # {{lb|pt|mathematics}} degree of a [[polynomial]] [[Category:pt:Geometry]] [[Category:pt:Units of measure]]
